title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupts layout
description: When deleting items from the Coolbar, the layout gets corrupted. This issue was observed in build 2002071610021.
OB: When pressing the Delete button, the first item on the second row is deleted. However, the entire second row is also removed.
EB: The second row should remain intact after deleting an item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Run the attached test case.
2. Drag the Open Type coolitem to the second row (last coolItem).
3. Drag the Launch coolitem (last coolItem on first row) to the second row, placing it after the Open Type item.
4. Drag the Search coolitem to the second row, placing it after the Launch coolitem.
5. Drag the Script coolitem to the second row (last coolItem on first row), placing it after the Search coolitem.
6. Press the Delete button.

Expected result:
The first item on the second row should be deleted without removing the entire second row.
